title: Poland, Lithuania and Latvia consider triggering NATO's Article 4 over the Belarus border crisis
content:
1. Poland, Lithuania and Latvia consider triggering NATO's Article 4 over the Belarus border crisis  CNN

  3. How Minsk became a destination for migrants travelling as tourists  Reuters
  4. EU agrees new sanctions on Belarus, airlines over border crisis  Reuters
